name: Island of Silence
description:
A demo island in the sky scene I made last year (or the year before). The island was also made for a cutscene / animation project.

The stars and moon, the lamps and the swords are all pixel art with billboards.

The shell homes are made in blender. The fog was a standard asset. The buildings were combinations of basic cubes made in Unity. Lamps light up when close. Randomization scripts are on the houses as well to make it feel a bit more unique. The ground also lights up as you walk around the city. Island is floating on top of a terrain and there is a bridge leading down into a canyon.

Press F to toggle animation!

The Character Model
